imdb.title: Urara Meirochou
imdb.plot: Chiya enters the town of Meirocho to begin her training as a fortune teller's apprentice, and, hopefully, become the next Urara!

episodes.title: The Fortune-Teller Girl Sometimes Shows Her Stomach
episodes.plot: Chiya goes to Meirocho after receiving a letter. Meanwhile, she gets into trouble meeting some new friends along the way.

episodes.title: The Things We Search for and Our Dreams Are Sometimes Sweet!
episodes.plot: Chiya searches for her mother, but there are certain obstacles standing in her way. Meanwhile, Nono and Kon share stories about their mothers.

episodes.title: Our Friends and Colleagues Are Sometimes Rivals
episodes.plot: Kon ends up breaking an item, and now the girls must work off their debt to Benten if they ever want to get out.

episodes.title: Good and Bad Things Are Sometimes Ticklish
episodes.plot: The girls learn about omens, and mole divination. Afterwards, they start to see more of the bad omens than anything else.

episodes.title: Brides and Gods Sometimes Sneeze
episodes.plot: The White Kimono Festival is underway and the girls are learning about the different traditions. Meanwhile, Chiya has an unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: Love and Pursuit Sometimes Go 'Good Girl, Good Girl!'
episodes.plot: Romance is in the air. The girls decide to try to find Nina's soulmate and do some kokkuri divining, which goes terribly wrong.

episodes.title: Invocations and Witches Sometimes Have to Be Ready
episodes.plot: The girls have to memorize an obscene number of invocations to pass their next test. Will they find a trick to memorizing them? Or will they break under the pressure?

episodes.title: Forbidden Things Are Sometimes Totally Naked!
episodes.plot: The girls finally take a vacation after all that studying! Meanwhile, Kon and Chiya try a dangerous divining technique.

episodes.title: Mothers and Knowledge Are Sometimes for You!
episodes.plot: Things start to get a little intense when the girls start to divine for things they shouldn't. Kon seems troubled.

episodes.title: Four Girls and the Ranking Exam Are Sometimes a Trial
episodes.plot: The girls must take their first rank advancement exam! In their search for the exam key, Chiya's past catches up with her.

episodes.title: Chiya and the Dark Sometimes Cry
episodes.plot: Chiya gets kidnapped by strange creatures and learns important information about her mother. Meanwhile, another creature takes interest in her.

episodes.title: Baths and Celebrations Sometimes Have Smiles
episodes.plot: After passing their exams, the whole gang heads off to the hot springs where they solidify their friendship.
